sentences.english: Ensures and is accountable for adherence to applicable wage and hour laws for non-exempt and minor store partners.
sentences.chinese: 确保并负责对所有店员应用相关的工资及工时政策。

sentences.english: The whole suit took 600 man hours to make. (Click on the above link to see the bejeweled suit.)
The Accident Intensity is expressed as the lost man-hours per 1,000 man-hours.
sentences.chinese: 事故强度表示每十万工时中因伤害事故而损失的工时。

sentences.english: The Accident Intensity is expressed as the lost man-hours per 1,000 man-hours.
sentences.chinese: 事故强度表示每十万工时中因伤害事故而损失的工时。

sentences.english: The design team was able to dispense with the time-consuming steps of welding on the seat and back rest.
sentences.chinese: 设计团队省略生产时焊接研磨的繁琐步骤与工时。

sentences.english: Employers pay the highest hourly rate to people with experience in networking technologies.
sentences.chinese: 雇主支付拥有网络工程师的雇员的工时费最高。

sentences.english: The oil workers have chucked down their tools again, demanding shouter hours and higher pay.
sentences.chinese: 石油工人又罢工了，要求缩短工时增加工资。

sentences.english: Worker skill levels, progressive, non-working hours waiting for the time machine.
sentences.chinese: 工人技能水平向上，工时不含机器等待时间。

sentences.english: No longer needs the ceramic tile 45 degrees cutting edges, saved man-hour and the breakage greatly.
sentences.chinese: 不再需要瓷砖45度切边，大大节约了工时和破损。

sentences.english: Though it took about 1000 hours of staff time, the changeover was well received.
sentences.chinese: 这个改变花费了1000个工时，但也颇受到好评。

sentences.english: Whether to execute duty of integrated computation man-hour to allow day to exceed 8 hours?
sentences.chinese: 实行综合计算工时工作制是否答应日超8小时？

sentences.english: There is the definition of the finishing hours for each kind of toy.
sentences.chinese: 这是对每种玩具的修整工时的定义。

sentences.english: The factory timekeeper keeps account of the hours of work done.
Don't drink alcohol or beverage with alcohol while taking analgesics and antipyretics .
sentences.chinese: 服用解热镇痛工时，不能同时饮酒或含有酒精的饮料。

sentences.english: They will NOT charge me for labor as well, so I can't complain.
sentences.chinese: 他们将不收工时费，所以我不能抱怨什么。

definition: piece rate wage/remuneration based on one's output/opposite: time rate wage 計時工資|计时工资[ji4 shi2 gong1 zi1]
time allocated for a project/completion date
kind of work in production (e.g. benchwork, foundry work etc)
to go to work/to be present (at work, school etc)/to be away on business
to delay one's work/to be late for or absent from work/loss of working time

pinyin: ba1 xiao3 shi2 gong1 zuo4 zhi4
